scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/utils && npm run build && cd ../ui && npm run build
scripts.dev:packages: concurrently -k "cd packages/utils && npm run dev" "cd packages/ui && npm run dev"
scripts.clean: cd packages/utils && npm run clean && cd ../ui && npm run clean
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../../packages/ui && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm run build:packages
